overview_of_class: This data literacy course introduces research on cultural markets, social media, and crowdsourcing, and provides students with tools to practically apply this research. You will learn how to plot and interpret graphs to measure performance in a cultural market; use Internet search data, Google's Ngram Viewer, and Twitter conversations to forecast trends; build, visualize, and explore networks; train machine-learning algorithms for prediction; and use Amazon's Mechanical Turk for crowdsourcing.
name: Special Topics in Creative Enterprises
title: SoC MSLCE 529-0-1 Special Topics in Creative Enterprises
enrl_requirement: Enrollment Requirements: Registration is reserved for students in the MSLCE students only.

You will learn how to plot and interpret graphs to measure performance in a cultural market; use Internet search data, Google's Ngram Viewer, and Twitter conversations to forecast trends; build, visualize, and explore networks; train machine-learning algorithms for prediction; and use Amazon's Mechanical Turk for crowdsourcing.

descriptions.name: Class Materials (Required)
descriptions.value: Computer or laptop required for class.

subject: MSLCE
